Symbol.Script_3D:
if show_el<EPS then end IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = -1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 ENDIF
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 THEN END
res = 24 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN res = 8 ! Simple
IF useSysMat THEN MainBoxMaterial = sMat MATERIAL MainBoxMaterial PEN gs_cont_pen RESOL res
operatedMode = 0 addStatus = 0 IF GLOB_CONTEXT > 40 AND GLOB_CONTEXT < 50 THEN operatedMode = 1 addStatus = 2 ENDIF
! --- KITCHEN SINK --- !
unID = 1 HOTSPOT 0, 0, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A, 0, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, B, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A, B, 0, unID: unID=unID+1
gx = A/4-3*edgeThick/4 gy = B-edgeThick-edgeThickTop
ADD A/4+edgeThick/4, edgeThick,0 GOSUB 200 DEL 1
gx = A/4-3*edgeThick/4 gy = B-edgeThick-edgeThickTop
ADD 3*A/4-edgeThick/4, edgeThick,0 GOSUB 200 DEL 1
IF operatedMode THEN ADDz -0.001 PRISM_ 4, 0.001, 0,0, 15, 0,B, 15, A,B,15, A,0,15 DEL 1 ELSE POLY_ 4, 0,0, 1, 0,B, 1, A,B,1, A,0,1 ENDIF
CUTEND CUTEND
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 THEN CUTPOLYA 2,1,0, ConPosX_3,ConPosY_3,915, ConWidth_3/2,360,4015 ENDIF
gx = A/4-3*edgeThick/4 gy = B-edgeThick-edgeThickTop
ADD A/4+edgeThick/4, edgeThick,-ZZYZX GOSUB 100 DEL 1 IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 THEN CUTEND
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 THEN CUTPOLYA 2,1,0, ConPosX_4,ConPosY_4,915, ConWidth_4/2,360,4015 ENDIF gx = A/4-3*edgeThick/4 gy = B-edgeThick-edgeThickTop
ADD 3*A/4-edgeThick/4, edgeThick,-ZZYZX GOSUB 100 DEL 1 IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 THEN CUTEND
ADD A/2, B-0.03, 0 GOSUB 1000 DEL 1
DEL TOP RESOL res
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
IF iDirHCWaterConn = 1 THEN ConEdit_1 = 16 ConEdit_2 = 16 ELSE ConEdit_1 = 12 ConEdit_2 = 12 ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, ui_current_con = ui_current_con, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, MEP_NumConnectionData = gs_Connections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, cShow3D = 1, gs_ConMat = MainBoxMaterial, MEP_InsShow = 0, MEP_cline_show_3D = 0, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, ConPosX_1=ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1=ConPosY_1, ConPosZ_1=ConPosZ_1, ConLength_1=ConLength_1, ConEdit_1 = ConEdit_1, ConPosX_2=ConPosX_2, ConPosY_2=ConPosY_2, ConPosZ_2=ConPosZ_2, ConLength_2=ConLength_2, ConEdit_2 = ConEdit_2, ConPosX_3=ConPosX_3, ConPosY_3=ConPosY_3, ConPosZ_3=ConPosZ_3, ConLength_3=ConLength_3, ConEdit_3 = 15, ConPosX_4=ConPosX_4, ConPosY_4=ConPosY_4, ConPosZ_4=ConPosZ_4, ConLength_4=ConLength_4, ConEdit_4 = 15 END
100: IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 THEN EXTRUDE 9, 0,0,ZZYZX,1+addStatus+4+16+32, -gx, gy-R, 1, -gx, R, 1, -gx+R, 0, 1001, gx-R, 0, 1, gx, R, 1001, gx, gy-R, 1, gx-R, gy, 1001, -gx+R, gy, 1, -gx, gy-R, 1001 ENDIF IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN EXTRUDE 4, 0,0,ZZYZX,1+addStatus+4+16+32, -gx, gy, 0, -gx, 0, 0, gx, 0, 0, gx, gy, 0 ENDIF RETURN
200: IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 THEN CUTPOLYA 9,1,0, -gx, gy-R, 1, -gx, R, 1, -gx+R, 0, 1001, gx-R, 0, 1, gx, R, 1001, gx, gy-R, 1, gx-R, gy, 1001, -gx+R, gy, 1, -gx, gy-R, 1001 ENDIF IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN CUTPOLYA 4,1,0, -gx, gy, 1, -gx, 0, 1, gx, 0, 1, gx, gy, 1 ENDIF RETURN
1000: ! Tap
CYLIND 0.02,0.017 ROTx 90 ROTy -90 ADDz -0.01 PRISM_ 10,0.02, 0.147986393591, 0.09234439178515, 15, 0.04117544321573, 0.09234439178515, 79, -0.01198261107796, 0.04424275934702, 79, -0.01198261107796, 0.02, 15, 0.01198261107796, 0.02, 15, 0.01198261107796, 0.04424275934702, 79, 0.04737063515823, 0.07626465611579, 79, 0.127986393591, 0.07626465611579, 15, 0.127986393591, 0.05893770166193, 15, 0.147986393591, 0.05893770166193, 15 DEL 3
ADDx 0.07 CYLIND 0.02,0.017 ADDz 0.02 ROTz 10 PRISM 4,0.01, -0.007, 0.01, -0.007,-0.08, 0.007,-0.08, 0.007, 0.01 DEL 3
ADDx -0.07 CYLIND 0.02,0.017 ADDz 0.02 ROTz -24 PRISM 4,0.01, -0.007, 0.01, -0.007,-0.08, 0.007,-0.08, 0.007, 0.01 DEL 3
RETURN
Symbol.Script_2D:
if show_el<EPS then end IF gs_detlevel_2D_m = 0 THEN END
PEN gs_cont_pen SET FILL gs_fill_type
unID = 1 DrawingNum = 1 IF DrawingNum = 1 THEN ! Top DRAWINDEX 20
! --- KITCHEN SINK --- !
HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 A, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0, B, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 A, B, unID: unID=unID+1
IF GLOB_CONTEXT <> 22 THEN POLY2_B 4, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0,0, 1, 0,B, 1, A,B,1, A,0,1
CIRCLE2 ConPosX_3,ConPosY_3, ConWidth_3/2 CIRCLE2 ConPosX_4,ConPosY_4, ConWidth_4/2
gx = A/4-3*edgeThick/4 gy = B-edgeThick-edgeThickTop
ADD2 A/4+edgeThick/4, edgeThick GOSUB 100 DEL 1
gx = A/4-3*edgeThick/4 gy = B-edgeThick-edgeThickTop
ADD2 3*A/4-edgeThick/4, edgeThick GOSUB 100 DEL 1 ENDIF ENDIF DEL TOP
DRAWINDEX 10
! --- OTHER VIEWS --- !
ROT2 (SYMB_MIRRORED - NOT(SYMB_MIRRORED)) * (DrawingNum > 1) * SYMB_ROTANGLE
IF DrawingNum = 2 THEN PROJECT2 -3, 90, 2 ! Bottom IF DrawingNum = 3 THEN PROJECT2 4, 270, 2 ! Front IF DrawingNum = 4 THEN PROJECT2 4, 90, 2 ! Back IF DrawingNum = 5 THEN PROJECT2 4, 180 * SYMB_MIRRORED, 2 ! Right IF DrawingNum = 6 THEN PROJECT2 4, 180 * NOT(SYMB_MIRRORED), 2 ! Left
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
IF iDirHCWaterConn = 1 THEN ConEdit_1 = 15 ConEdit_2 = 15 ELSE ConEdit_1 = 5 ConEdit_2 = 5
CIRCLE2 ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1, ConWidth_1/2 CIRCLE2 ConPosX_2, ConPosY_2, ConWidth_2/2 ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, ui_current_con = ui_current_con, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, MEP_NumConnectionData = gs_Connections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, DrawingNum = DrawingNum, MEP_InsShow = 0, MEP_cline_show = 0, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, gs_fill_type=gs_fill_type, gs_fill_pen=gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen=gs_back_pen, ConPosX_1=ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1=ConPosY_1, ConLength_1=ConLength_1, ConEdit_1 = ConEdit_1, ConPosX_2=ConPosX_2, ConPosY_2=ConPosY_2, ConLength_2=ConLength_2, ConEdit_2 = ConEdit_2, ConPosX_3=ConPosX_3, ConPosY_3=ConPosY_3, ConLength_3=ConLength_3, ConEdit_3 = 5, ConPosX_4=ConPosX_4, ConPosY_4=ConPosY_4, ConLength_4=ConLength_4, ConEdit_4 = 5 DEL 1
END
100: POLY2_ 9, 5, -gx, gy-R, 1, -gx, R, 1, -gx+R, 0, 1001, gx-R, 0, 1, gx, R, 1001, gx, gy-R, 1, gx-R, gy, 1001, -gx+R, gy, 1, -gx, gy-R, 1001 RETURN
Symbol.Script_1D:
success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "show_axis", show_axis) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "show_axis_and", show_axis_and) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "show_isol", show_isol) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "show_conventions", show_conventions) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "show_size", show_size) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "gs_detlevel_2D_m",gs_detlevel_2D_m) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "gs_detlevel_3D_m", gs_detlevel_3D_m) call "Показ_систем" PARAMETERS All isMep=1 RETURNED_PARAMETERS show_el, syst_name
EPS = 0.0001
! --- HARDCODED AND DERIVED VARIABLES --- !
edgeThick = 0.04 edgeThickTop = 0.08 R = 0.03
z = 0
PARAMETERS ac_toplevel = z PARAMETERS ac_bottomlevel = z
Symbol.Script_UI:
! Double Kitchen Sink
UI_DIALOG `Специальные Параметры MEP`
DIM ui_vis_attr[4][4] FOR i = 1 TO 4 FOR j = 1 TO 4 ui_vis_attr[i][j] = 0 NEXT j NEXT i ui_vis_attr[1][1] = 2 ui_vis_attr[1][2] = 1 ui_vis_attr[1][3] = 7
ui_vis_attr[2][1] = 1 ui_vis_attr[2][2] = 237 ui_vis_attr[2][3] = 68 ui_vis_attr[2][4] = 14
DIM ui_con_type[4] ui_con_type[1] = 0 ui_con_type[2] = 0 ui_con_type[3] = 0 ui_con_type[4] = 0
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS ALL ui_vis_attr = ui_vis_attr, ui_centerline_vars = 0, ui_con_type = ui_con_type, ui_system_var_pos = 2, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
Symbol.Script_VL:
! Double Kitchen Sink
call "FM_types_MEP" parameters DIM shape_typ_to_validation[3] shape_typ_to_validation[1] = 0 ! Rectangle shape_typ_to_validation[2] = 1 ! Circle shape_typ_to_validation[3] = 0 ! Oval
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_detlevel_3D" OR gs_detlevel_3D_m = -1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D_m = gs_detlevel_3D_m ELSE IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Детальный` PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D = gs_detlevel_3D ENDIF
VALUES "gs_detlevel_3D" `Детальный`,`Простой`,`Откл.` VALUES "gs_detlevel_3D_m" 2, 1, 0
! --- MAIN PARAMETERS --- !
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN minW = 0.3 IF A<minW THEN A=minW PARAMETERS A=minW ENDIF VALUES "A" RANGE [minW,]
minD = 0.3 IF B<minD THEN B=minD PARAMETERS B=minD ENDIF VALUES "B" RANGE [minD,]
IF ZZYZX<0.1 THEN ZZYZX=0.1 PARAMETERS ZZYZX=ZZYZX ENDIF VALUES "ZZYZX" RANGE [0.1,] ENDIF
DIM stDirHCWaterConn[] stDirHCWaterConn[1] = `Прямой` stDirHCWaterConn[2] = `Вертикальный`
VALUES "DirHCWaterConn" stDirHCWaterConn VALUES "iDirHCWaterConn" 1, 2
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "DirHCWaterConn" THEN IF DirHCWaterConn = stDirHCWaterConn[1] THEN iDirHCWaterConn = 1 IF DirHCWaterConn = stDirHCWaterConn[2] THEN iDirHCWaterConn = 2
PARAMETERS iDirHCWaterConn = iDirHCWaterConn ELSE IF iDirHCWaterConn = 1 THEN DirHCWaterConn = stDirHCWaterConn[1] IF iDirHCWaterConn = 2 THEN DirHCWaterConn = stDirHCWaterConn[2]
PARAMETERS DirHCWaterConn = DirHCWaterConn ENDIF
! --- OBJECT SPECIFIC PARAMETERS --- !
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN epsSpec = MAX(EPS, R-ConWidth_3/2)
minX = edgeThick+ConWidth_3/2+epsSpec maxX = A/2-edgeThick/2-ConWidth_3/2-epsSpec minY = edgeThick+ConWidth_3/2+epsSpec maxY = B-edgeThickTop-ConWidth_3/2-epsSpec VALUES "ConPosX_3" RANGE [minX, maxX] VALUES "ConPosY_3" RANGE [minY, maxY] IF ConPosX_3<minX THEN ConPosX_3=minX PARAMETERS ConPosX_3=minX ENDIF IF ConPosX_3>maxX THEN ConPosX_3=maxX PARAMETERS ConPosX_3=maxX ENDIF IF ConPosY_3<minY THEN ConPosY_3=minY PARAMETERS ConPosY_3=minY ENDIF IF ConPosY_3>maxY THEN ConPosY_3=maxY PARAMETERS ConPosY_3=maxY ENDIF
epsSpec = MAX(EPS, R-ConWidth_4/2)
minX = A/2+edgeThick/2+ConWidth_4/2+epsSpec maxX = A-edgeThick-ConWidth_4/2-epsSpec minY = edgeThick+ConWidth_4/2+epsSpec maxY = B-edgeThickTop-ConWidth_4/2-epsSpec VALUES "ConPosX_4" RANGE [minX, maxX] VALUES "ConPosY_4" RANGE [minY, maxY] IF ConPosX_4<minX THEN ConPosX_4=minX PARAMETERS ConPosX_4=minX ENDIF IF ConPosX_4>maxX THEN ConPosX_4=maxX PARAMETERS ConPosX_4=maxX ENDIF IF ConPosY_4<minY THEN ConPosY_4=minY PARAMETERS ConPosY_4=minY ENDIF IF ConPosY_4>maxY THEN ConPosY_4=maxY PARAMETERS ConPosY_4=maxY ENDIF
PARAMETERS ConPosZ_3 = -ZZYZX PARAMETERS ConPosZ_4 = -ZZYZX ENDIF
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "ConPosY_1" THEN ConPosY_2 = ConPosY_1 PARAMETERS ConPosY_2 = ConPosY_2 ENDIF
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "ConPosY_2" THEN ConPosY_1 = ConPosY_2 PARAMETERS ConPosY_1 = ConPosY_1 ENDIF IF iDirHCWaterConn = 2 THEN ConPosZ_1 = 0 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_1 = ConPosZ_1 ConPosZ_2 = 0 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_2 = ConPosZ_2 ENDIF
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
PARAMETERS MEP_NumberConnections = 4
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "ZZYZX" THEN ConPosZ_3=-ZZYZX PARAMETERS ConPosZ_3=ConPosZ_3 ConPosZ_4=-ZZYZX PARAMETERS ConPosZ_4=ConPosZ_4 ENDIF
! --- COLD WATER CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 1 ConName = `Соединение Трубы - Холодная Вода`
ConDVecX = 0 IF iDirHCWaterConn = 1 THEN ConDVecY = 1 ConDVecZ = 0 ELSE ConDVecY = 0 ConDVecZ = -1 ENDIF
ConWVecX = 1 ConWVecY = 0 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN maxCW = A/4
VALUES "ConLength_1" RANGE [0,] VALUES "ConWidth_1" RANGE (0, maxCW] VALUES "ConDepth_1" RANGE (0, maxCW]
LOCK "ConType_1"
IF ConWidth_1<EPS THEN ConWidth_1=EPS PARAMETERS ConWidth_1=EPS ENDIF IF ConWidth_1>maxCW THEN ConWidth_1=maxCW PARAMETERS ConWidth_1=maxCW ENDIF
VALUES "ConWallThickness_1" RANGE [0,ConWidth_1/2] ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_1, ConPosY = ConPosY_1, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_1, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_1, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_1, ConWidth = ConWidth_1, ConDepth = ConDepth_1, ConLength = ConLength_1, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_1, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_1, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_1, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_1, ConToolType = ConToolType_1, ConStatus = ConStatus_1, ConType_1 = ConType_1, ConConnectorType_1 = ConConnectorType_1, ConSystem_1 = ConSystem_1, ui_page_idx = ui_page_idx, ui_current_con = ui_current_con, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_1, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0"
! --- HOT WATER CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 2 ConName = `Соединение Трубы - Горячая Вода`
ConDVecX = 0 IF iDirHCWaterConn = 1 THEN ConDVecY = 1 ConDVecZ = 0 ELSE ConDVecY = 0 ConDVecZ = -1 ENDIF
ConWVecX = 1 ConWVecY = 0 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN maxCW = A/4
VALUES "ConLength_2" RANGE [0,] VALUES "ConWidth_2" RANGE (0, maxCW] VALUES "ConDepth_2" RANGE (0, maxCW]
LOCK "ConType_2"
IF ConWidth_2<EPS THEN ConWidth_2=EPS PARAMETERS ConWidth_2=EPS ENDIF IF ConWidth_2>maxCW THEN ConWidth_2=maxCW PARAMETERS ConWidth_2=maxCW ENDIF
VALUES "ConWallThickness_2" RANGE [0,ConWidth_2/2] ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_2, ConPosY = ConPosY_2, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_2, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_2, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_2, ConWidth = ConWidth_2, ConDepth = ConDepth_2, ConLength = ConLength_2, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_2, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_2, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_2, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_2, ConToolType = ConToolType_2, ConStatus = ConStatus_2, ConType_2 = ConType_2, ConConnectorType_2 = ConConnectorType_2, ConSystem_2 = ConSystem_2, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_2, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0"
! --- WASTE CONNECTION 1 --- !
ConID = 3 ConName = `Соединение Трубы - Канализация 1`
ConDVecX = 0 ConDVecY = 0 ConDVecZ = -1
ConWVecX = -1 ConWVecY = 0 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN maxCW = A/4
VALUES "ConLength_3" RANGE [0,] VALUES "ConWidth_3" RANGE (0, maxCW] VALUES "ConDepth_3" RANGE (0, maxCW]
LOCK "ConType_3"
IF ConWidth_3<EPS THEN ConWidth_3=EPS PARAMETERS ConWidth_3=EPS ENDIF IF ConWidth_3>maxCW THEN ConWidth_3=maxCW PARAMETERS ConWidth_3=maxCW ENDIF
PARAMETERS ConPosZ_3 = -ZZYZX
VALUES "ConWallThickness_3" RANGE [0, ConWidth_3/2] ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_3, ConPosY = ConPosY_3, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_3, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_3, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_3, ConWidth = ConWidth_3, ConDepth = ConDepth_3, ConLength = ConLength_3, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_3, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_3, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_3, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_3, ConToolType = ConToolType_3, ConStatus = ConStatus_3, ConType_3 = ConType_3, ConConnectorType_3 = ConConnectorType_3, ConSystem_3 = ConSystem_3, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_3, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0"
! --- WASTE CONNECTION 2 --- !
ConID = 4 ConName = `Соединение Трубы - Канализация 2`
ConDVecX = 0 ConDVecY = 0 ConDVecZ = -1
ConWVecX = -1 ConWVecY = 0 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN maxCW = A/4
VALUES "ConLength_4" RANGE [0,] VALUES "ConWidth_4" RANGE (0, maxCW] VALUES "ConDepth_4" RANGE (0, maxCW]
LOCK "ConType_4"
IF ConWidth_4<EPS THEN ConWidth_4=EPS PARAMETERS ConWidth_4=EPS ENDIF IF ConWidth_4>maxCW THEN ConWidth_4=maxCW PARAMETERS ConWidth_4=maxCW ENDIF
PARAMETERS ConPosZ_4 = -ZZYZX
VALUES "ConWallThickness_4" RANGE [0, ConWidth_4/2] ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_4, ConPosY = ConPosY_4, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_4, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_4, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_4, ConWidth = ConWidth_4, ConDepth = ConDepth_4, ConLength = ConLength_4, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_4, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_4, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_4, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_4, ConToolType = ConToolType_4, ConStatus = ConStatus_4, ConType_4 = ConType_4, ConConnectorType_4 = ConConnectorType_4, ConSystem_4 = ConSystem_4, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_4, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0"
IF setProgram THEN SetProgram = 0 PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram ENDIF
